name: Home Assistant Dev
postCreateCommand: pip3 install --upgrade pip && pip3 install homeassistant colorlog debugpy isal && sudo curl -L https://github.com/AlexxIT/go2rtc/releases/download/v1.9.12/go2rtc_linux_arm64 -o /usr/local/bin/go2rtc && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/go2rtc && mkdir -p config/custom_components && ln -sf ../../custom_components/bravia_quad config/custom_components/
